content:

inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 46, "index": 13}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "fire_coral", "quantity": 53, "index": 22}, {"type": "glass_pane", "quantity": 8, "index": 23}, {"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}, {"type": "light_gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft brown_dye, I need to move the cocoa beans from slot 15 to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
